Somi was one of the two bodyguards who worked for the proprietor of Danthelons Dancing Axe in Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Somi was a gruff and tough half-orc with leathery tan skin and long mop of brown hair. He had brown eyes, yellow tusks, and a single nose ring decorated with a tiny skull. Somi wore a breastplate and carrie da massive greataxe.
Somi and his brother entered Entharl Danthelonâ€Žs employ sometime in or before the . Both half-orcs diligently guarded the shop, the proprietor, and the shops cellar, that was secretly used as a Harper safehouse. Somi made sure that no Harper meeting was interrupted by city guards nor steel watchers.
